data.route_analysis: Various transportation options available including flights, trains, and buses with associated costs and travel times.
data.pricing_trends: Prices generally rise in peak seasons, dipping slightly in off-seasons.
data.seasonal_patterns: Peak travel months are June to August, with a decline in December and February.
data.booking_windows: Optimal booking recommended 2-3 months in advance for better rates.

destination_insights.route_analysis: Various transportation options available including flights, trains, and buses with associated costs and travel times.
destination_insights.seasonal_patterns: Peak travel months are June to August, with a decline in December and February.
destination_insights.climate: Hot summers with average temperatures ranging from 25-35°C, mild winters with temperatures around 5-15°C.
destination_insights.culture: Rich in traditions, vibrant festivals celebrated, local cuisine is diverse and unique to the region.

market_insights.pricing_trends: Prices generally rise in peak seasons, dipping slightly in off-seasons.
market_insights.booking_windows: Optimal booking recommended 2-3 months in advance for better rates.
market_insights.demand: Very popular travel destination with increasing international tourist numbers.
market_insights.competition: Competes with several other nearby tourist spots, drawing significant interest from travelers.

trend_insights.market_trends: Eco-tourism and sustainable travel are becoming prominent trends among travelers.
trend_insights.consumer_behavior: Increasing preference for personalized travel experiences over packaged tours.
trend_insights.competitive_landscape: Emerging local businesses competing against established players, focusing on niche markets.
trend_insights.seasonal_factors: Travel decisions are greatly influenced by local festivals and climate conditions.
